history.title: About Parq Casino Vancouver
history.description2: Parq Casino Vancouver is a modern entertainment destination located in the heart of Vancouver. It combines a casino, luxury hotels, restaurants, and bars to create a premium leisure experience. Visitors can enjoy a wide range of games, stylish lounges, and stunning city views. The complex also features a spa, fitness facilities, and event spaces, making it a popular spot for both relaxation and business gatherings. Its prime location near major city venues makes it an ideal choice for travelers and locals alike.

customHtml.title: A World of Luxury and Entertainment in the Heart of the City
customHtml.description:
Parq Casino Vancouver is more than just a casino — it’s a premium entertainment destination located in downtown Vancouver, right next to BC Place and Rogers Arena. The spacious gaming floor spans two levels and features hundreds of slot machines, dozens of classic table games, and the largest poker room in British Columbia. For those seeking privacy and exclusivity, high-limit gaming rooms offer an elevated experience with exceptional service.


Guests can indulge in a diverse culinary journey across the property’s restaurants and bars. Honey Salt serves farm-to-table dishes, The Victor specializes in premium steaks and seafood, while KOI Noodle Bar brings authentic Asian flavors. For cocktail enthusiasts and stylish evenings, D/6 Lounge and the Johnnie Walker Lounge provide a sophisticated atmosphere with stunning city views.


The complex boasts two luxury hotels — JW Marriott and The Douglas — offering modern rooms, the Spa by JW, fitness centers, and outdoor terraces with breathtaking vistas. It’s also a prime venue for conferences, weddings, and large-scale events, thanks to its expansive meeting spaces and professional event services. Parq Casino is the perfect choice for those who value comfort and elegance.


Entertainment at Parq goes beyond gaming: guests can enjoy culinary festivals, themed parties, and live concerts. The casino’s close partnership with BC Place and Rogers Arena makes it a hotspot for visitors attending sports and music events, ensuring a vibrant and dynamic atmosphere year-round.


Loyalty is rewarded through the Encore Rewards program, which offers exclusive perks, discounts, complimentary parking, and personalized benefits. The more you play and stay, the higher your status and privileges, turning every visit into a true VIP experience.


Rules for Visiting Parq Casino Vancouver

Visiting Parq Casino Vancouver is subject to certain conditions designed to ensure guest comfort and safety. The casino operates 24/7, but entry is restricted to adults only. The atmosphere blends style and freedom, so there is no strict dress code, though guests are encouraged to dress appropriately for a premium venue.


Key rules and conditions:

  • • Minimum age for entry is 19 years (as per British Columbia regulations).
  • • You do not need to be a hotel guest to access the casino.
  • • Individuals who are visibly intoxicated or on self-exclusion lists are not permitted.
  • • Dress code: no strict requirements, attire ranges from casual to formal.
  • • To join the Encore Rewards loyalty program, register at Guest Services.
  • • Gaming rules follow responsible play standards under the Responsible Gaming policy.

Encore Rewards: Your Privilege at Parq Casino Vancouver

Encore Rewards is an exclusive loyalty program designed for regular guests of the casino. It allows you to earn points while playing slots, table games, and even when dining or drinking at the property. These points can be redeemed for free play, restaurant discounts, and access to private contests and special promotions. The program makes every visit more rewarding, offering free parking and personalized offers.


The more you play, the higher your status and benefits. The program has four tiers — from basic to elite — each unlocking new perks: faster point accumulation, exclusive gifts, and enhanced discounts. New members receive a welcome bonus, while regulars enjoy birthday gifts and special offers.


Program Benefits

  • • Free registration and a $20 Free Play welcome bonus.
  • • Points for gaming and dining: 1,000 points = $5 Free Play.
  • • Free parking with qualified play.
  • • Dining and beverage discounts up to 15%.
  • • Personalized offers and birthday gifts.
  • • Access to exclusive contests and promotions.

Membership Levels

  • • Single Diamond: 0–9,999 points — basic perks.
  • • Double Diamond: 10,000–49,999 points — faster earning (+5%).
  • • Triple Diamond: 50,000–149,999 points — extra bonuses and discounts (+10%).
  • • Elite: 150,000+ points — maximum privileges, VIP packages, up to +15% acceleration.

Bonuses and Conditions

  • • Points are earned on slots, table games, and dining purchases.
  • • Higher tiers mean faster point accumulation and more exclusive offers.
  • • Program valid at all BC casinos and PlayNow.com.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Parq Casino Vancouver
customHtml_2.description:
Special Offers and Bonuses at Parq Casino Vancouver

Parq Casino Vancouver offers guests not only gaming excitement but also a wide range of bonuses, promotions, and seasonal events that make every visit rewarding. The casino regularly hosts cash prize draws, jackpots, and tournaments for slot and table game enthusiasts. Special offers for new players, holiday promotions, and themed nights create an atmosphere of exclusive entertainment. Seasonal events include culinary festivals, concerts, and parties, while gaming promotions give players the chance to win big and enjoy extra perks.


Key bonuses and offers

  • • Welcome bonus for new players: up to $20 Free Play upon registration.
  • • Daily slot jackpots: winnings up to $250,000.
  • • Poker tournaments: prize pools starting from $10,000 and higher.
  • • Seasonal promotions: Christmas draws, summer festivals with prizes up to $50,000.
  • • Happy Hour in bars: drink discounts and free slot play.
  • • Exclusive High Limit nights: special bonuses for high-stakes players.
  • • Holiday giveaways and raffles: gift cards, free play, and cash prizes.

Popular Games at Parq Casino Vancouver

Parq Casino Vancouver offers a wide range of games designed for both beginners and seasoned players. The gaming floor features hundreds of modern slot machines with vibrant graphics and bonus features. Table games include classics like blackjack, roulette, baccarat, and poker, as well as Pai Gow and Ultimate Texas Hold’em. Poker enthusiasts will find the largest poker room in British Columbia, hosting regular tournaments. For high-stakes players, exclusive High Limit Rooms provide a premium gaming experience. Additionally, electronic baccarat terminals linked to live tables offer a unique blend of technology and tradition.


Popular games and areas

  • • Slot machines: over 600 slots with progressive jackpots and bonus rounds.
  • • Table games: blackjack, roulette, baccarat, Pai Gow, Ultimate Texas Hold’em.
  • • Poker room: the largest in BC, featuring major tournaments.
  • • High Limit Rooms: exclusive spaces for high-stakes gaming.
  • • Electronic baccarat: 12 terminals connected to live tables.
  • • Proline Sportsbook Lounge: sports betting, big screens, live wagering.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Parq Casino Vancouver

Parq Casino Vancouver offers flexible betting options for players of all levels. From low-stakes tables for beginners to exclusive VIP rooms for high rollers, the casino ensures an exciting experience for everyone. Slot machines feature a wide range of bet sizes, while table games allow players to choose their preferred level of risk.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots $0.01 $100+
Roulette $5 $500
Blackjack $10 $500
Baccarat $15 $1,000+
Pai Gow Poker $25 $500
Ultimate Texas Hold’em $25 $500
High Limit Slots $1 $1,000+
VIP Baccarat $100 $10,000+

Events and Entertainment at Parq Casino Vancouver

Parq Casino Vancouver is not just about gaming — it’s a hub for nightlife and premium entertainment. The venue hosts regular themed parties, culinary festivals, concerts, and special shows that create an unforgettable experience. With its proximity to major city arenas, guests can combine sports events or concerts with a night of fun at the casino. Nightlife is a highlight here: stylish lounges and bars transform into vibrant spaces for DJ sets and late-night parties.


Regular events include weekly music nights, wine and cocktail tastings, and special gaming promotions with prize draws. The D/6 Lounge serves as the casino’s nightlife hotspot, featuring live music, DJs, and dancing, all set against stunning city views. Seasonal celebrations bring themed shows — from New Year’s Eve parties to summer festivals on outdoor terraces. Sports fans can enjoy a dedicated lounge with live game broadcasts and betting options.


All entertainment and events

  • • D/6 Lounge — nightclub with DJ sets, cocktails, and dancing.
  • • Culinary festivals — tastings of dishes and drinks by top chefs.
  • • Music nights — live performances and DJ shows every week.
  • • Proline Sports Lounge — live sports broadcasts, betting, big screens.
  • • Holiday shows — New Year’s parties, summer open-air festivals.
  • • Gaming promotions — prize draws, jackpots, poker tournaments.
  • • Themed parties — Halloween, Valentine’s Day, Summer Nights.

Restaurants, Bars, and Relaxation at Parq Casino Vancouver

Parq Casino Vancouver is not just about gaming — it’s a culinary destination featuring premium restaurants, stylish bars, and relaxing lounges. Guests can enjoy dishes crafted by top chefs, sip signature cocktails, and unwind in spaces with stunning city views. Each restaurant offers a unique concept, from farm-to-table dining to exquisite steaks and seafood. Bars provide an extensive drink selection, including rare whiskies and creative cocktails.


The complex also includes two luxury hotels — JW Marriott and The Douglas — offering modern accommodations, spa facilities, and fitness centers. After gaming, guests can relax at Spa by JW, enjoy outdoor terraces with scenic views, or spend time in elegant lounges. Parq Casino creates a complete leisure experience where entertainment, fine dining, and premium service come together.


All relaxation spots

  • • Honey Salt — farm-to-table restaurant with local ingredients.
  • • The Victor — steaks, seafood, and a premium wine list.
  • • BC Kitchen — modern comfort food with a twist.
  • • KOI Noodle Bar — authentic Asian dishes and noodles.
  • • D/6 Lounge — chic lounge with cocktails and DJ sets.
  • • Lotus Whiskey Lounge — rare whiskies and premium drinks.
  • • JW Marriott Parq Vancouver — luxury hotel with Spa by JW.
  • • The Douglas — designer hotel with modern amenities.

items.title: Can I pay for gaming with a card?
items.answer: Yes, debit and credit cards are accepted, as well as cash.

items.title: Are ATMs available in the casino?
items.answer: Yes, ATMs are located throughout the property.

items.title: What languages does the staff speak?
items.answer: English is primary, but multilingual staff is available.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted in restaurants and bars?
items.answer: Cards, cash, and earned reward points are accepted.

items.title: Is the casino open 24/7?
items.answer: Yes, it operates around the clock.
